short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open current page in incognito mode (shortcut CTRL+I).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open current page in incognito mode, you have 3 options to do it:
- use shortcut "CTRL+I"
- click icon in toolbar
- select `Go Incognito!` from right-click menu
